data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85.0) AND (storage_usage IS NULL OR storage_usage < 90.0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool FACET microsoft_azure_elastic_pool_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_elastic_pool_name) AS 'Elastic Pools' FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool FACET microsoft_azure_sql_server_name

presentation.title: SQL Server Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent SQL Server of this Elastic Pool

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_elastic_pool_name) AS 'Elastic Pools' FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool FACET microsoft_azure_resource_group_name

presentation.title: Resource Group Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Resource Group of this Elastic Pool

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_elastic_pool_name) AS 'Elastic Pools' FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool FACET state

presentation.title: State Distribution
presentation.notes: Current state of the Elastic Pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of CPU in use by the Elastic Pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(storage_usage) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Storage Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of storage in use by the Elastic Pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(data_io) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Data IO (Percent)
presentation.notes: Physical data read percentage of the Elastic Pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(dtu_consumption) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: DTU Consumption (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of Database Transaction Units consumed by the Elastic Pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(in_memory_oltp_storage) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: In-Memory OLTP Storage (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of in-memory Online Transaction Processing storage in use by the Elastic Pool

data.nrql: SELECT average(sessions) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Sessions (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of concurrent sessions in use. The maximum is determined by the service tier.

data.nrql: SELECT average(workers) FROM microsoft_azure_elastic_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Workers (Percent)
presentation.notes: Percentage of concurrent workers (requests) which are running. The maximum is determined by the service tier.
